Package gate.alignment.gui

Interface Summary
AlignmentAction This interface represents an AlignmentAction.
AlignmentView  
DataPublisherAction Implementers of this interface are the resources wishing to publish data in the Alignment editor.
FinishedAlignmentAction Implementers of these are called when user says that the alignment is finished.
IteratingMethod This interface declares a method that needs to be implemented by the implementors of this interface.
PreDisplayAction Implementers of these are called just before the pair is displayed.
 

Class Summary
AlignmentActionsManager Alignment actions manager that allows managing actions that should be taken on various occasions.
AlignmentEditor This class provides an editor for aligning texts in a compound document.
AlignmentFactory This class provides various methods that help in alignment process.
AlignmentTask Alignment Task class, used for retrieving PUAPairs
DefaultDataModel Implementation of Data Model used for populating tables in the Alignment Editor.
DefaultIteratingMethod Default implementation of the IteratingMethod interface.
Pair It represents a pair of two annotations, one from the source document and one from the target document.
PUAPair A pair representing parents of unit of alignment in the source and the target language.
 

Exception Summary
IteratingMethodException Exception that could occur while iterating over pairs for alignment.
